comments: Bridges' (CHA) maintains a collapsed forearm as he absorbs the contact initiated by Trier (NYK) as the two players come together during the drive.
Bridges (CHA) makes incidental "high-five" contact with Trier (NYK) after the release of the ball during his jump shot attempt.
Graham (CHA) slightly extends his forearm into Trier's (NYK) front but his momentum carries him away from the marginal contact during the drive.
Robinson (NYK) is in the paint for less than three seconds when the shot is imminent.
Payton (NYK) maintains a legal guarding position as Graham (CHA)  loses control of the ball during the drive.
Rozier (CHA) cleanly dislodges the ball from Payton (NYK) during his drive.
Robinson (NYK) maintains a legal guarding position during Rozier's (CHA) driving shot attempt.
Trier (NYK) commits a take foul on Rozier (CHA).

call_type: Turnover: Lost Ball Out of Bounds
comments: The ball is last touched by Payton (NYK). Possession is corrected awarded to the Hornets.
Harkless (NYK) commits a take foul on Bridges (CHA).
Trier (NYK) commits a take foul on Rozier (CHA).
